mapper.insert: insert into schedule (sche_name, uno, sche_start, sche_end, sche_count) values (#{scheName}, #{uno}, #{scheStart}, #{scheEnd}, #{scheCount})
mapper.select: SELECT s.sche_name, s.sche_start, s.sche_end, s.sche_count, sd.sche_content_id, sd.sche_index, sd.sche_date FROM schedule s JOIN schedule_detail sd ON s.sco = sd.sco Where s.sco=${sco} and sd.sche_date = ${date}
mapper.update: update schedule set sche_name=#{scheName} where sco=#{sco}
update schedule set sche_memo = #{i} where sco = #{sco}
mapper.select: select sche_memo from schedule where sco=#{sco}
